products.title: Bella Blackout Pearl 89mm Vertical Blind
products.metadescription: Bella Blackout Pearl 89mm Vertical Blind in Grey. Made to measure from £13.99 with FREE UK mainland delivery. This 89mm Vertical Blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
Bella is a beautiful range of blinds with a good selection of colours. The blackout feature makes it perfect for those who want to create darkness in the room at any time.
 
 Product ID: SDB-VTB1386 Fabric Colour: Pearl Material: 100% Polyester Lining: Colour Match Backing - See Sample Headrail: White Slimline Headrail Supported By White Steel Brackets - Top or Face Fixable     Slat Width: 89mm Control Type: Smooth Chain Operation with Cord tilt OR Wand Tilt and Pull Energy Saving Rating: ER3 - Highest Energy Saving Value - UV Protection and Effective Thermal Retention Blackout: Yes

products.title: Bella Blackout Dove Grey 89mm Vertical Blind
products.metadescription: Bella Blackout Dove Grey 89mm Vertical Blind in Grey. Made to measure from £14.14 with FREE UK mainland delivery. This 89mm Vertical Blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
Our best-selling Bella Blackout range comes in several colours and features a natural weave effect finish and colour-match blackout backing, perfect for adding style inside and outside your home!This Dove Grey vertical blind adds a bold splash of colour and is also made from blackout fabric, to help blackout the light when desired, making this quality made to measure vertical blind a perfect addition to room that needs optimum light control.  Whether its fully closed, binge-watching the latest riveting TV drama, or letting the light in (but keeping your privacy), our vertical blinds are great for privacy and light control.At Swift Direct Blinds, we take quality seriously.  Not only are we situated in the heart of the Yorkshire textile industry, but our own company is also seeped with a rich history, with over 50 years experience making blinds and curtains for home up and down the country.  This grey vertical blind not only comes with a fabulous 5 year guarantee, for extra peace of mind, but is made by our blind specialists and comes with caring customer-first service.  Still not sure?  Why not check out our industry-leading SizeSure measuring-insurance, or if really in rush browse our SwiftTrack blinds, for delivery next day!
 
 Product ID: SDB-VTB1314 Fabric Colour: Dove Grey Material: 100% Polyester Lining: Colour Match Backing - See Sample Headrail: White Slimline Headrail Supported By White Steel Brackets - Top or Face Fixable     Slat Width: 89mm Control Type: Smooth Chain Operation with Clear Tilt Wand or Wand Tilt and Pull Energy Saving Rating: ER3 - Highest Energy Saving Value - UV Protection and Effective Thermal Retention Blackout: Yes

products.title: Bella Blackout Cream 89mm Vertical Blind
products.metadescription: Bella Blackout Cream 89mm Vertical Blind in Cream. Made to measure from £14.14 with FREE UK mainland delivery. This 89mm Vertical Blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
This blackout cream vertical blind blends perfectly with any style or taste, whether your decor is on the modern, minimalist side or if you prefer to add bright and bold accessories.  Our Bella Blackout range comes in several colours and features a natural weave effect finish and colour match blackout backing, perfect for adding style inside and outside your home! Loved by our customers for its simplicity and value for money, our Bella Blackout fabrics come in a wide range of colours suitable for all rooms including kitchens and bathrooms.This vertical blind with accompanying white components and gorgeous cream fabric colour is a easy and quick way to update your window. Our vertical blinds are value for money and easy to install. For ease of mind, all our products come with a 5 year guarantee, made in the heart or the Yorkshire textile homeland, Swift Direct Blinds upholds high quality products at highly-competitive online prices.
 
 Product ID: SDB-VTB1300 Fabric Colour: Cream Material: 100% Polyester Lining: Colour Match Backing - See Sample Headrail: White Slimline Headrail Supported By White Steel Brackets - Top or Face Fixable     Slat Width: 89mm Control Type: Smooth Chain Operation with Cord tilt OR Wand Tilt and Pull Energy Saving Rating: ER3 - Highest Energy Saving Value - UV Protection and Effective Thermal Retention Blackout: Yes

products.title: Bella Butter (Blackout)
products.metadescription: Buy made to measure Bella Butter (Blackout) Blackout Vertical Blinds from SoEasy Blinds. Order quality Blackout Vertical Blinds online today at low prices with fast UK delivery
products.productdescription:
Min Width: 250mm Max Width: 4115mm
 	Min Drop: 300mm Max Drop: 2913mm
 	Fabric Composition: Polyester
 	Louvre Width: 89mm
 	Guarantee: 12 Months
 	Fittings: Included
 	Controls: Cord control to open/close and beaded chrome chain to tilt louvres, or wand control to open/close and twist wand to tilt louvres.
 	Stack: A choice of left, right or split.
 	Louvres: Louvres are supplied with top hangers and are available with bottom weights with stabilising chain or chainless bottom weights.
